oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Strategies for organic research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lockeretz, Willie
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
"Organics" in general
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report was presented at the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference. In this paper three suggestions are offered for increasing the value of organic farming research.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lockeretz, Willie (2002) Strategies for organic research. In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 25-32.
